copy.response_0_0: It's not easy caring for baby animals. Even when they're sick, they want to play.
copy.response_0_1: I mean, I must spend half my day playing Find the Patient!
copy.response_1_1: A thing of beauty is a joy forever...
copy.response_1_2: ...but an animal that has been healed is a FRIEND forever!
copy.response_2_0: I like to start each day by playing with the animals in Beck's Animal Nursery. It's so much fun!
copy.response_2_1: I like to play Catch Me best, but I know what the animals' favorite game is...
copy.response_3_0: I guess you could say I'm like a tinker-talent -- I FIX things!
copy.response_3_1: But the things I fix thank me afterwards with sweet smiles and sloppy critter kisses.
copy.response_3_2: I wouldn't have it any other way!
copy.response_4_0: Don't worry, your Animal Friend will get sick less often as they grow older!
copy.response_5_0: Oh no! I'm low on Honeycombs!
copy.response_5_1: Honeycombs are a favorite snack of Fireflies.
copy.response_5_2: Hm, no wonder there is a friendly rivalry between Fireflies and Bees!
copy.response_6_0: Animal Friends love to play games with Fairies -- it helps them practice their skills!
copy.response_7_0: Be sure to help your Animal Friend train by playing games with them as often as you can!
